duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Supply Chain Management functions at the professional level.
Cross train to support other SCM functional areas including Warehouse Operations, Property Management, Facility Management, and Acquisition Services.
Facilitate the effective operations of SCM by identifying and implementing continuous improvements.
Act as a liaison to provide support at the field level.
Complete training requirements for positions as required by the company.
Obtain and maintain proficiency on company designated systems/applications for processing work.
Provide feedback to SCM managers in performance reviews to ensure timely addressal of performance issues.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or equivalent State Credential (Bachelor's degree preferred)
